text: Eugenia Grandet is a 1953 Mexican drama film directed by Emilio Gómez Muriel and starring Marga López, Julio Villarreal and Andrea Palma.Goble p.111 It is based on the 1833 French novel Eugénie Grandet by Honoré de Balzac. ==Cast== * Marga López as Eugenia Grandet * Julio Villarreal as Don Eugenio Grandet * Andrea Palma as Matilde Grandet * Ramón Gay as Carlos Grandet * Hortensia Santoveña as Ana, sirvienta * José Pidal as Señor Santiesteban, banquero * Enrique Díaz 'Indiano' as Pedro López, notario * Armando Velasco as Padre Agustín * Alberto Carrière as Socio de Carlos * Lilia Fernández * Irlanda Mora as Esposa de Carlos * Ángel Merino as Luis Santiesteban * Rafael Estrada as Sobrino de padre Agustín * Victorio Blanco as Socio de don Eugenio * Rodolfo Calvo as Médico * León Barroso as Cartero * José Chávez as Mayordomo * María Gentil Arcos as Señora Santiesteban * Elodia Hernández as Madre de Laura * Elvira Lodi as Mujer en aeropuerto * Pepe Nava as Transeúnte * Carlos Robles Gil as Hombre busca prestamo == References == == Bibliography == * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. == External links == * Category:1953 films Category:1953 drama films Category:Mexican drama films Category:Mexican films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films based on Eugénie Grandet Category:Films directed by Emilio Gómez Muriel
title: Eugenia Grandet (1953 film)
